q: president of technology. The shake-up, which will take effect April 4, is the biggest change in management at the company since Mr. Eric Schmidt joined as chief executive in 2001. Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Mr. Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post. We found two of the eight missing artifacts outside the museum between a government building that got burned and the gift shop. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters.
